00030 void IndexHeader::reset()
00031 {
00032     m_strErrMsg = "";
00033     m_strIndexFile = "";
00034 
00035     m_dFormatVersion = 1.0; // initial version
00036     m_strTransformMethod = "MVA"; // default to Minus vs Average
00037     m_iNumProbeSets = 0;
00038     m_iNumSamples = 0;
00039     m_iNumFields = 0;
00040     m_iFixedFields = 0;
00041     m_iSignalFields = 0;
00042 
00043     m_vSampleNames.clear();
00044     m_vFields.clear();
00045     m_mapSampleToIndexes.clear();
00046     m_mapFieldToIndexes.clear();
00047 
00048     m_callTable.reset();
00049 }
00050 
00051 int IndexHeader::bytesForField(string strFieldType)
00052 {
00053     if (strFieldType == "byte" || strFieldType == "char" || strFieldType == "int8") {
00054         return 1;
00055     }
00056     else if (strFieldType == "int16") {
00057         return 2;
00058     }
00059     else if (strFieldType == "int32" || strFieldType == "float32") {
00060         return 4;
00061     }
00062     else if (strFieldType == "int64" || strFieldType == "float64") {
00063         return 8;
00064     }
00065     else {
00066         return 0;
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00070 bool IndexHeader::readFile(string strIndexFile)
00071 {
00072     clearErrMsg();
00073 
00074     try {
00075         ifstream file;
00076         file.open(strIndexFile.c_str());
00077         if (!file.is_open()) {
00078             setErrMsg("Failed to open index file for reading.\tFile: " + strIndexFile);
00079             return false;
00080         }
00081 
00082         m_callTable.reset();
00083         char szLine[MAX_LINE];
00084         while (file.getline(szLine, MAX_LINE)) {
00085             vector<string> vTokens, vParts;
00086             string strLine = szLine;
00087             Util::trimString(strLine);
00088             if (strLine.find("#%%format-version=") == 0) {
00089                 string strFormatVersion = strLine.substr(18);
00090                 Util::trimString(strFormatVersion);
00091                 m_dFormatVersion = Convert::toDouble(strFormatVersion);
00092             }
00093             else if (strLine.find("#%%brlmmp-transform=") == 0) {
00094                 string strTransform = strLine.substr(20);
00095                 Util::trimString(strTransform);
00096                 strTransform = Util::upcaseString(strTransform);
00097                 m_strTransformMethod = strTransform;
00098             }
00099             else if (strLine.find("#%%num-probesets=") == 0) {
00100                 string strNumProbeSets = strLine.substr(17);
00101                 Util::trimString(strNumProbeSets);
00102                 m_iNumProbeSets = Convert::toInt(strNumProbeSets);
00103             }
00104             else if (strLine.find("#%%num-samples=") == 0) {
00105                 string strNumSamples = strLine.substr(15);
00106                 Util::trimString(strNumSamples);
00107                 m_iNumSamples = Convert::toInt(strNumSamples);
00108                 m_vSampleNames.reserve(m_iNumSamples);
00109             }
00110             else if (strLine.find("#%%cel-name-") == 0) {
00111                 Util::chopString(strLine, "=", vTokens);
00112                 if (vTokens.size() == 2) {
00113                     string strSampleName = vTokens[1]; Util::trimString(strSampleName);
00114                     string strSampleNameLower = strSampleName;
00115                     strSampleNameLower = Util::downcaseString(strSampleNameLower);
00116                     int iSampleIndex = (int)m_vSampleNames.size();
00117                     m_vSampleNames.push_back(strSampleName);
00118                     m_mapSampleToIndexes.insert(make_pair(strSampleNameLower, iSampleIndex));
00119                 }
00120             }
00121             else if (strLine.find("#%%num-fields=") == 0) {
00122                 string strNumFields = strLine.substr(14);
00123                 Util::trimString(strNumFields);
00124                 m_iNumFields = Convert::toInt(strNumFields);
00125                 m_vFields.reserve(m_iNumFields);
00126             }
00127             else if (strLine.find("#%%field-") == 0) {
00128                 Util::chopString(strLine, "=", vTokens);
00129                 if (vTokens.size() == 2) {
00130                     string strField = vTokens[1]; Util::trimString(strField);
00131                     Util::chopString(strField, ":", vParts);
00132                     if (vParts.size() == 2) {
00133                         string strName = vParts[0]; Util::trimString(strName);
00134                         string strType = vParts[1]; Util::trimString(strType);
00135                         int numBytesForField = IndexHeader::bytesForField(strType);
00136                         if (numBytesForField > 0) {
00137                             string strNameLower = strName;
00138                             strNameLower = Util::downcaseString(strName);
00139                             int iFieldIndex = (int)m_vFields.size();
00140                             m_vFields.push_back(make_pair(strName + ":" + strType, numBytesForField));
00141                             m_mapFieldToIndexes.insert(make_pair(strNameLower, iFieldIndex));
00142                         }
00143                     }
00144                 }
00145             }
00146             else if (strLine.find("#%%max-alleles=") == 0) {
00147                 string strMaxAlleles = strLine.substr(15);
00148                 Util::trimString(strMaxAlleles);
00149                 int iMaxAlleles = Convert::toInt(strMaxAlleles);
00150                 m_callTable.setMaxAlleles(iMaxAlleles);
00151             }
00152             else if (strLine.find("#%%max-cn-states=") == 0) {
00153                 string strMaxCNStates = strLine.substr(17);
00154                 Util::trimString(strMaxCNStates);
00155                 int iMaxCNStates = Convert::toInt(strMaxCNStates);
00156                 m_callTable.setMaxCNStates(iMaxCNStates);
00157             }
00158             else if (strLine.find("#%%call-code-") == 0) {
00159                 Util::chopString(strLine, "=", vTokens);
00160                 if (vTokens.size() == 2) {
00161                     string strField = vTokens[1]; Util::trimString(strField);
00162                     Util::chopString(strField, ":", vParts);
00163                     if (vParts.size() == 3) {
00164                         string strCallName = vParts[0]; Util::trimString(strCallName);
00165                         string strCallCode = vParts[1]; Util::trimString(strCallCode);
00166                         string strCNState = vParts[2]; Util::trimString(strCNState);
00167                         int iCallCode = Convert::toInt(strCallCode);
00168                         int iCNState = Convert::toInt(strCNState);
00169                         CallRow row;
00170                         row.setRowIndex(m_callTable.getCount());
00171                         row.setCallName(strCallName);
00172                         row.setCallCode(iCallCode);
00173                         row.setCNState(iCNState);
00174                         m_callTable.add(row);
00175                     }
00176                 }
00177             }
00178         }
00179 
00180         file.close();
00181 
00182         // save index file name
00183         setIndexFile(strIndexFile);
00184 
00185         if (getNumFields() == 0) {
00186             setNumFields((int)m_vFields.size());
00187         }
00188         setFixedFields(4); // Call/Confidence/LogRatio/Strength
00189         setSignalFields(getNumFields() - getFixedFields());
00190 
00191         if (getNumSamples() != (int)m_vSampleNames.size()) {
00192             setErrMsg("Number of samples is not consistent with number of cel files.\tFile: " + strIndexFile + ", NumSamples: " + Convert::toString(getNumSamples()) + ", NumCelFiles: " + Convert::toString(m_vSampleNames.size()));
00193             return false;
00194         }
00195 
00196         if (getNumFields() != (int)m_vFields.size()) {
00197             setErrMsg("Number fields in sample is not consistent with number of field names.\tFile: " + strIndexFile + ", NumFieldsInSample: " + Convert::toString(getNumFields()) + ", NumFieldNames: " + Convert::toString(m_vFields.size()));
00198             return false;
00199         }
00200     }
00201     catch (...) {
00202         setErrMsg("Unknown exception occurred while parse header section for index file.\tFile: " + strIndexFile);
00203         return false;
00204     }
00205 
00206     return true;
00207 }
00208 
00209 int IndexHeader::getBytesPerSample(int numAlleles)
00210 {
00211     int iBytesPerSample = 0;
00212     for (int i = 0; i < (m_iFixedFields + numAlleles); i++) {
00213         if (i < (int)m_vFields.size()) {
00214             iBytesPerSample += m_vFields[i].second;
00215         }
00216     }
00217     return iBytesPerSample;
00218 }
00219 
00220 int IndexHeader::getBytesPerSampleBlock(int numAlleles)
00221 {
00222     int bytesPerSample = getBytesPerSample(numAlleles);
00223     return bytesPerSample * getNumSamples();
00224 }
00225 
00226 int IndexHeader::getBytesPerSampleBlock(SampleList& vSamples)
00227 {
00228     int bytesPerSampleBlock = 0;
00229     for (int i = 0; i < (int)vSamples.size(); i++) {
00230         bytesPerSampleBlock += getBytesPerSample(vSamples[i].getNumAlleles());
00231     }
00232     return bytesPerSampleBlock;
00233 }
00234 
00235 int IndexHeader::findSampleIndex(string strSampleName)
00236 {
00237     std::map<std::string, int>::iterator iterFind;
00238     string strSampleNameLower = strSampleName;
00239     strSampleNameLower = Util::downcaseString(strSampleNameLower);
00240     iterFind = m_mapSampleToIndexes.find(strSampleNameLower);
00241     if (iterFind != m_mapSampleToIndexes.end()) {
00242         return iterFind->second;
00243     }
00244     return -1; // not found
00245 }
